name: Rune Collecter
description:
Collect the ancient runes of power to help protect this world from evil! There are many runes out there to collect, as well as few ancient relics to find along the way.

Each level will throw a new challenge at you, getting progressively harder as you continue forward on your journey. How far will you make it before you turn back? Only time will tell…

Features:

  • Randomized levels for replay ability
  • Star system – Gain more points to collect more stars

Click and drag, or swipe if using touchscreen, to move the pieces to try and match 3 or more runes together.
